# particleSize

**Instance Property**

The starting size of each particle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var particleSize: CGSize { get set }
```

```swift
var particleSize: CGSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGSizeZero]. If set to the default, the size of the texture stored in the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleTexture] property is used to determine the size of a particle. If a texture has not been assigned, you must set this property to a non-empty size.

## Changing a Particle’s Source Image and Size

- **particleTexture**: The texture to use to render a particle.
